SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

com.poesys.db.dao
Class XMemcachedClientPool

java.lang.Object
  com.poesys.db.dao.XMemcachedClientPool
Deprecated. 

@Deprecated
public class XMemcachedClientPool
extends java.lang.Object

A singleton connection pool for xmemcached clients. The pool contains a minimum number of xmemcached clients connected to memcached. You can acquire any number of clients up to the maximum allowed. There is a global timeout after which an inactive object becomes stale and gets closed. You set the minimum and maximum number of clients and the timeout in milliseconds in the com::poesys::db::memcached.properties file. This class is currently deprecated because it apparently causes the I/O system to go crazy, opening a huge number of polling event pipe sockets!

Author:
Robert J. Muller

XMemcachedClientPool

private XMemcachedClientPool()
                      throws java.io.IOException
Deprecated. 
Create the XMemcachedClientPool object. This gets called once at virtual machine startup by the statically initialized pool manager.

Throws:
java.io.IOException - when there is a problem building a new client

Get the singleton instance of the pool manager.

Returns:

setProperties

private void setProperties()
Deprecated. 
Set the properties of the connection pool from the properties file. You should call this method as often as necessary so that the values are reasonably fresh. The properties change only if the propertiesFrozen flag is set to false.

freezeProperties

public void freezeProperties(boolean freeze)
Deprecated. 
Freeze the property settings. This flag tells the pool not to refresh its properties from the properties file, allowing you to control the properties dynamically using the property accessors. Use this flag during testing. The default is not to freeze.

Parameters:
freeze - true to freeze, false to refresh

getClient

public net.rubyeye.xmemcached.MemcachedClient getClient()
                                                 throws java.io.IOException,
                                                        DbErrorException
Deprecated. 
Get an xmemcached client. This method will either return a client or an exception if the pool is full and no clients are available. This method is synchronized because it changes both the pool queue and the client map.

Returns:
a client
Throws:
java.io.IOException - when there is a problem creating a new client
DbErrorException - when the pool is exhausted (max size exceeded)

computeAddSize

private java.lang.Long computeAddSize(int size)
Deprecated. 
Compute the possible number of clients that you can add to the current map based on a pre-computed desired number to add and the maximum size permitted for the map.

Parameters:
size - the size of the map
Returns:
the number of elements you can add to the map given the max-clients size

collect

public void collect()
             throws java.io.IOException
Deprecated. 
Collect garbage on the pool by iterating through the pool and removing any clients that are stale until the pool has the minimum number of clients. This action shrinks the pool down to its minimum size. Note that the pool queue may have fewer clients than the minimum if there are active clients still working. This method is synchronized because it changes the state of both the pool and the map of all clients.

Throws:
java.io.IOException - when there is a problem closing the memcached connection

release

public void release(net.rubyeye.xmemcached.MemcachedClient client)
Deprecated. 
Release a client, making it inactive. This will also set the clock ticking on the timeout for the client.

Parameters:
client - the client to de-activate

getActiveClients

java.util.List<net.rubyeye.xmemcached.MemcachedClient> getActiveClients()
Deprecated. 
DEBUGGING ONLY: Get the list of active xmemcached clients. These are the clients that are currently "in use", gotten from the pool but not closed. Declared package access for access within the package only.

Returns:
a list of clients

getInactiveClients

java.util.List<net.rubyeye.xmemcached.MemcachedClient> getInactiveClients()
Deprecated. 
DEBUGGING ONLY: Get the list of inactive xmemcached clients. These are the clients that are currently not "in use", in the queue. Declared package access for access within the package only.

Returns:
a list of clients

close

public void close()
Deprecated. 
Close all memcached connections and xmemcached clients and destroy the pool manager. This method is synchronized as it clears both the pool queue and the client map.
